text: Bedu'inara bale, ‘amara imana analama’. Baluna, ‘tomara imana anani, baram tomara bala, ‘amara atnasamarpana karechi’, karana imana ekhano tomadera antare prabesa kareni. Ara yadi tomara allah‌ o tamra rasulera anugatya kara tabe tini tomadera amalasamuhera sa'oyaba saman'ya parimana'o laghaba karabena na. Niscaya allah‌ ksamasila, parama dayalu.’
